__TOC__


Ubuntu Love Days are dedicated to the growth and encouragement of new Ubuntu contributors. Whether it's filing, triaging or fixing bugs, learning how to make packages, promoting and supporting Ubuntu in your local community, becoming a member or maintainer, or any of the other countless things you can do to contribute or get involved, Ubuntu Love is for you!

 We meet in '''#ubuntu-love''' on irc.freenode.net

Topics we always cover:

* Finding, filing, triaging and fixing bugs in the current development branch
* Questions about development in general, including UbuntuProcedures
* UbuntuDevelopment - getting information, understanding the tools
* Marketing and advocacy - incubating new LoCoTeamList, special projects
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/newmember|Becoming members and maintainers]]</nowiki>
* Joining Ubuntu UbuntuTeams
** <nowiki>[[MOTU]]</nowiki> - the Masters of the Universe make universe great!
** <nowiki>[[MOTU-TODO]]</nowiki> - drop by in #ubuntu-motu and get involved!
